Title: Exempts certain books, magazines, pamphlets and other related items sold at certain book fairs from sales and compensating use taxes
Summary: Exempts books, magazines, pamphlets and other related items sold at a primary or secondary school facility or at a library at a book fair organized, hosted or sponsored by an organization established for educational purposes, including but not limited to a parent-teacher association, booster club, or a similar school-based association which supports school activities, or a friends of the library organization from sales and compensating use taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting books, magazines, pamphlets and other related items sold at certain book fairs from sales and compensating use taxes
